ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_metxmet | |- ( D e. ( Met ` X ) -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_xmetres2 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( *Met ` R ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( *Met ` R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_metf | |- ( D e. ( Met ` X ) -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> R C_ X ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xpss12 | |- ( ( R C_ X /\ R C_ X ) -> ( R X. R ) C_ ( X X. X ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylancom | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> ( R X. R ) C_ ( X X. X ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_fssresd | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) : ( R X. R ) --> RR ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ismet2 | |- ( ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( Met ` R ) <-> ( ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( *Met ` R ) /\ ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) : ( R X. R ) --> RR ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 9, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ R C_ X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( Met ` R ) ) |
